SEARCH
Package org.example.Gateaway

Class Gateway

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
org.example.Gateaway.Gateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, IGateway
public class Gateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IGateway
The Gateway class is a server-side RMI implementation that handles interactions between various barrels and a queue service. It provides methods for inserting URLs into the queue, performing searches, retrieving statistics, and managing barrel registrations. The Gateway also integrates with external services such as the Hacker News API and provides an interface for clients to request and receive updates.
See Also:

    • search

      public List<SearchResult> search(ArrayList<String> search) throws RemoteException
      Performs a search across the active barrels for the given search terms.

      A barrel is selected randomly via refreshAndSelectBarrel() and tried first. If it fails or returns no results, the remaining barrels are tried in order. All barrels are instructed to update their top-word statistics before searching. The method records response times and updates search-related statistics.

      Specified by:
      search in interface IGateway
      Parameters:
      search - An ArrayList of keywords to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of SearchResult objects containing results from the first successful barrel, or an empty list if all barrels fail or return no results.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • getStatistics

      public SystemStatistics getStatistics() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the current system statistics, including barrel sizes and average response times.
      Specified by:
      getStatistics in interface IGateway
      Returns:
      The current system statistics.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while retrieving the statistics.

    • getConnections

      public SearchResult getConnections(String url) throws RemoteException
      Attempts to retrieve URL connections from a given URL.

      A barrel is selected randomly via refreshAndSelectBarrel() and tried first. If it fails or returns no results, the method iterates through the remaining barrels in order. It records response times and updates statistics accordingly.

      Specified by:
      getConnections in interface IGateway
      Parameters:
      url - The URL for which to retrieve connection information.
      Returns:
      A SearchResult containing the found connection data, or an error message if all barrels fail.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • registerStatisticsListener

      public void registerStatisticsListener(IStatistics listener) throws RemoteException
      Registers a listener for system statistics updates. The listener will be notified of any changes to the statistics.
      Specified by:
      registerStatisticsListener in interface IGateway
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to register.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while registering the listener.

    • hacker

      public void hacker(String title) throws RemoteException
      Performs a search on Hacker News top stories and adds URLs to the queue if any of the search terms are found in the article's title, text, or HTML content.

      This method queries the Hacker News API for the top stories, normalizes the search title by removing diacritical marks and punctuation, and then searches for each term in the title and text of the articles. If no match is found, it fetches the HTML content of the article and checks there as well.

      Specified by:
      hacker in interface IGateway
      Parameters:
      title - the search title used to match against Hacker News articles' titles, texts, and HTML content.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error, including failures to connect to the Hacker News API.

    • getAI

      public String getAI(String search, List<SearchResult> result) throws RemoteException
      Interacts with the OpenRouter API to provide AI-assisted responses based on the search results.
      Specified by:
      getAI in interface IGateway
      Parameters:
      search - The search query that generated the search results.
      result - The search results to be used in the AI request.
      Returns:
      A string containing the AI-generated response.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while communicating with the OpenRouter API.
